title: Please identify this condensed font
content:
Hi,

Please help me identify the possible typeface used here. It looks familiar but I can't remember the font. The time frame is 1920s or earlier. Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture-4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023211216/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-4_0.jpg) | 31.79 KB |
author: marica

comments.content:
i think that the font is a custom hand done one...

[http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/6239/picture40copyzx9.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023211216/http:/img149.imageshack.us/img149/6239/picture40copyzx9.jpg "http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/6239/picture40copyzx9.jpg")

have a look at both the small e's very carefully... especially the counter's...

i could be wrong... but thats my best bet.

--  
arjun
Oh well, you are probably right about custom made. Thanks arjun.
